CadSettings.cadNameDescription: The name of your SnailyCAD instance. This can be the name of your community or server, etc.
CadSettings.cadLogoDescription: The logo of your SnailyCAD instance. This can be the logo of your community or server, etc. Note: page reload may be required.
CadSettings.cadOpenGraphDescriptionInfo: This will show on an embed when the CAD is shared on social media. Best to keep short and simple
CadSettings.areaOfPlayDescription: The area where roleplay is currently active
CadSettings.registrationCodeDescription: Users are required to enter this code when creating a new account.
CadSettings.roleplayEnabledDescription: When disabled, this will display a banner displaying that roleplay is currently disabled.
CadSettings.cadWhitelistDescription: The CAD will be whitelisted. Any new user will need to be reviewed, then they can be approved or denied.
CadSettings.towWhitelistDescription: The tow system will be whitelisted. The Tow permission must be given to the user before they can use the tow system.
CadSettings.taxiWhitelistDescription: The taxi system will be whitelisted. The Taxi permission must be given to the user before they can use the taxi system.
CadSettings.businessWhitelistDescription: The business system will be whitelisted. Any new business must first be reviewed, then they can be approved or denied before it can be used.
CadSettings.timeZoneDescription: The time zone that will be used in the SnailyCAD instance. This will apply to all users.

DiscordRolesTab.discordRolesInfo: When a CAD user authenticates via Discord, the respective CAD permissions will be granted to that CAD user from their Discord roles.
DiscordRolesTab.adminRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set admin permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.leoRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set LEO permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.leoSupervisorRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set LEO Supervisor permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.emsFdRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set EMS/FD permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.dispatchRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set dispatch permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.towRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set tow permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.taxiRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set taxi permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.courthouseRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent set courthouse permissions in the CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.whitelistedRoleInfo: The Discord Role that will represent whitelisted access.

DiscordWebhooksTab.discordWebhooksInfo: Select a channel for each webhook type. This will create a new Discord webhook and send webhooks on the respective event type.
DiscordWebhooksTab.calls911ChannelInfo: The Discord channel where 911 calls will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.statusUpdatesChannelInfo: The Discord channel where status updates will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.panicButtonChannelInfo: The Discord channel where panic button triggers will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.bolosChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new BOLOs will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.impoundedVehicleChannelInfo: The Discord channel where impounded vehicle notifications will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.citizenRecordsChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new arrest reports, tickets, warrants and written warnings will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.warrantsChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new warrants will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.bleeterPostChannelInfo: The Discord channel where new bleeter posts will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.citizenDeclaredDeadChannelInfo: The Discord channel where dead citizen notifications will be sent to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.departmentWhitelistStatusChannelInfo: When a unit is pending approval or gets accepted/denied this channel will be used to send a webhook to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.userWhitelistStatusChannelInfo: When a user is pending approval or gets accepted/denied this channel will be used to send a webhook to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.leoIncidentCreatedInfo: When an LEO incident is created this channel will be used to send a webhook to.
DiscordWebhooksTab.emsFdIncidentCreatedInfo: When an EMS/FD incident is created this channel will be used to send a webhook to.

RawWebhooksTab.rawWebhooksInfo: Set custom URLs for each webhook type. This will send webhooks on the respective event type with raw CAD data.
RawWebhooksTab.departmentWhitelistStatusChannelURL: Department Whitelist Status Change Webhook URL
RawWebhooksTab.userWhitelistStatusChannelURL: User Whitelist Status Change Webhook URL

LiveMapTab.noLiveMapUrls: No live map URLs have been added yet.
LiveMapTab.foundPreviousLiveMapURLDescription: The previous Live Map URL was found. Would you like to add it to the CAD?
LiveMapTab.liveMapUrlDescription: This URL will communicate to the live_map resource in your FiveM server.
LiveMapTab.liveMapSettingsInfo: Configure the live map URL and map tiles.
LiveMapTab.mapTilesDescription: These are the map tiles that will be shown in the live map. These must be named in the following format:
LiveMapTab.liveMapTilesAlertMessage: The image formats must be in .png or .jpg format.

ApiTokenTab.tokenDescription: This is the token used to communicate with the API. This token is unique and should not be shared with anyone. Read More
ApiTokenTab.discordBotCommandDescription: This command can be used with the Discord bot integration.
ApiTokenTab.readMorePublicAPI: Read more about the Public API here.

MiscSettingsTab.callsignTemplateInfo: This is the template for unit callsigns. You can use the following variables: {variables}
MiscSettingsTab.caseNumberTemplateInfo: This is the template for record case numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}
MiscSettingsTab.pairedUnitTemplateInfo: This is the template for paired units. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.driversLicenseTemplateInfo: This is the template for drivers license numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.pilotLicenseTemplateInfo: This is the template for pilot license numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.weaponLicenseTemplateInfo: This is the template for weapon license numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.waterLicenseTemplateInfo: This is the template for water license numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.huntingLicenseTemplateInfo: This is the template for hunting license numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.fishingLicenseTemplateInfo: This is the template for fishing license numbers. You can use the following variables: {variables}. Note: this will only apply to newly created citizens.
MiscSettingsTab.911CallInactivityTimeoutDescription: Calls that have not been updated after this timeout will be automatically ended. The format must be in minutes. (Default: none)
MiscSettingsTab.incidentInactivityTimeoutDescription: Incidents that have not been updated after this timeout will be automatically ended. The format must be in minutes. (Default: none)
MiscSettingsTab.unitInactivityTimeoutDescription: Units that have not been updated after this timeout will be automatically set off-duty. The format must be in minutes. (Default: none)
MiscSettingsTab.activeDispatcherInactivityTimeoutDescrip: Active Dispatchers that have not been updated after this timeout will be automatically set off-duty. The format must be in minutes. (Default: none)
MiscSettingsTab.boloInactivityTimeoutDescription: BOLOs that have not been updated after this timeout will be automatically ended. The format must be in minutes. (Default: none)
MiscSettingsTab.activeWarrantsInactivityTimeoutDescripti: Active Warrants that have not been updated after this timeout will be automatically set as non-active. The format must be in minutes. (Default: none)
MiscSettingsTab.maxLicensePointsDescription: Define the maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their license is suspended.
MiscSettingsTab.maxDriverLicensePointsDescription: The maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their drivers license is suspended (Default: 12)
MiscSettingsTab.maxPilotLicensePointsDescription: The maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their pilots license is suspended (Default: 12)
MiscSettingsTab.maxWeaponLicensePointsDescription: The maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their weapon license is suspended (Default: 12)
MiscSettingsTab.maxFishingLicensePointsDescription: The maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their fishing license is suspended (Default: 12)
MiscSettingsTab.maxHuntingLicensePointsDescription: The maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their hunting license is suspended (Default: 12)
MiscSettingsTab.maxWaterLicensePointsDescription: The maximum amount of license points a citizen can have before their water license is suspended (Default: 12)
MiscSettingsTab.weightPrefixDescription: The prefix for the weight unit (eg: kg or lbs)
MiscSettingsTab.heightPrefixDescription: The prefix for the height unit (eg: cm or ft)
MiscSettingsTab.maxBusinessesPerCitizenDescription: The maximum amount of businesses a citizen can create (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxCitizensPerUserDescription: The maximum amount of citizens a user can create (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxDepartmentsPerUnitPerUser: Max Departments Per Unit Per User
MiscSettingsTab.maxDepartmentsPerUnitPerUserDescription: The maximum amount of units a user can create with a certain department. (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxDivisionsPerOfficerDescription: The maximum amount of divisions an officer can be in. (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxAssignmentsToIncidentsPerOfficer: Max Assignments To Incidents Per Officer
MiscSettingsTab.maxAssignmentsToIncidentsPerOfficerDescr: The maximum amount of incidents an officer can be assigned to. (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxAssignmentsToCallsPerUnit: Max Assignments To Calls Per Unit
MiscSettingsTab.maxAssignmentsToCallsPerUnitDescription: The maximum amount of calls a unit can be assigned to. (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxOfficersPerUserDescription: The maximum amount of officers a user can create (Default: Infinity)
MiscSettingsTab.maxPlateLengthDescription: The maximum allowed length of a plate (Default: 8)
MiscSettingsTab.jailTimeScalingDescription: The total jail time calculated from an arrest report will be converted to the scale set below. This will automatically checkout the citizen from jail after the time has ended in realtime.
MiscSettingsTab.citizenLicenseNumbersDescription: Manage the lengths of the citizen license numbers.
MiscSettingsTab.driversLicenseNumberLengthDescription: The length of the drivers license number (Default: 8)
MiscSettingsTab.pilotLicenseNumberLengthDescription: The length of the pilots license number (Default: 6)
MiscSettingsTab.weaponLicenseNumberLengthDescription: The length of the weapon license number (Default: 8)
MiscSettingsTab.waterLicenseNumberLengthDescription: The length of the water license number (Default: 8)
MiscSettingsTab.fishingLicenseNumberLengthDescription: The length of the fishing license number (Default: 8)
MiscSettingsTab.huntingLicenseNumberLengthDescription: The length of the hunting license number (Default: 8)
MiscSettingsTab.signal100RepeatAmountDescription: The amount of times Signal 100 should be repeated. (Default: 1)
MiscSettingsTab.signal100RepeatIntervalMsDescription: The amount of time between each Signal 100 message in milliseconds. (Default: 1000)

BlacklistedWords.blacklistedWordsDescription: SnailyCAD will verify if a citizen's name or vehicle's plate contains any of the blacklisted words.
BlacklistedWords.noBlacklistedWords: No blacklisted words have been added yet.
BlacklistedWords.removeBlacklistedWordDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this blacklisted word?

Features.TOW-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create tow calls
Features.TAXI-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create taxi calls
Features.TRUCK_LOGS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create truck logs.
Features.LICENSE_EXAMS-description: When enabled, this will require citizens to pass a license exam before they can obtain a license.
Features.AOP-description: When disabled, this will hide the AOP from the CAD.
Features.BUSINESS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create and join businesses.
Features.ALLOW_DUPLICATE_CITIZEN_NAMES-descriptio: When enabled, this will allow users to create citizens with the same name (name and surname)
Features.BLEETER-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create bleets.
Features.COURTHOUSE-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create expungement requests, name change requests. Users with the required permissions can create court entries and posts.
Features.WEAPON_REGISTRATION-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to register weapons.
Features.CALLS_911-description: When enabled, this will allow the user of 911 calls in the CAD.
Features.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBERS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to use Social Security Numbers.
Features.CUSTOM_TEXTFIELD_VALUES-description: When enabled, this will allow users to enter custom vehicle/weapon values when registering a vehicle/weapon
Features.ACTIVE_DISPATCHERS-description: When enabled, certain buttons on the LEO and EMS/FD dashboard will become disabled when there is an active dispatcher.
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_UPDATE_LICENSE: Allow citizens to update their licenses
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_UPDATE_LICENSE-description: When disabled, this will only allow officers to manage licenses for citizens.
Features.ALLOW_REGULAR_LOGIN-description: When disabled, this will only allow users to login with Discord/Steam.
Features.ACTIVE_INCIDENTS-description: When enabled, this will allow Dispatch to create active incidents.
Features.RADIO_CHANNEL_MANAGEMENT-description: When enabled, This will allow dispatch to manage the radio channel a unit is in. This can then be used to enhance the experience via the CAD's Public API.
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_DELETION_BY_NON_ADMIN: Allow citizens to delete their own citizen
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_DELETION_BY_NON_ADMIN-desc: When enabled, this will allow citizens to delete their own citizen.
Features.DMV-description: When enabled, vehicles must first be approved by the Department of Motor Vehicles within the CAD.
Features.BADGE_NUMBERS-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to use badge numbers.
Features.USER_API_TOKENS-description: When enabled, this will allow users to generate their own API token to perform actions with via their account.
Features.CITIZEN_RECORD_APPROVAL-description: When enabled, this will require supervisors to accept or decline arrest reports before they can be used.
Features.COMMON_CITIZEN_CARDS-description: When enabled, this will allow any officers to edit, register vehicles/weapons to, create medical records to any citizen.
Features.CREATE_USER_CITIZEN_LEO-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to create citizens and vehicles that don't exist yet when searching for them. This citizen/vehicle will not be connected to any user.
Features.LEO_TICKETS-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to create tickets.
Features.LEO_BAIL-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to add bails to arrest reports.
Features.COURTHOUSE_POSTS-description: When enabled, this will allow users with the correct permissions to create posts in the courthouse. These posts will be visible to anyone.
Features.ACTIVE_WARRANTS-description: When enabled, this will display active warrants on the LEO Dashboard.
Features.WARRANT_STATUS_APPROVAL-description: When enabled, this will require supervisors to approve 'active' warrants.
Features.CITIZEN_DELETE_ON_DEAD: Delete citizen when marked as dead
Features.CITIZEN_DELETE_ON_DEAD-description: When enabled, this will delete the citizen when the citizen is marked as dead.
Features.PANIC_BUTTON-description: When enabled, this will allow LEO and EMS-FD to press a panic button.
Features.DIVISIONS-description: When enabled, this will require officers and EMS-FD deputies to provide their division(s).
Features.TONES-description: When enabled, this will allow Dispatch to create temporary messages for LEO and EMS/FD.
Features.CITIZEN_CREATION_RECORDS-description: When enabled, this allow citizens to add charges and flags to their citizen.
Features.BUREAU_OF_FIREARMS-description: When enabled, weapons must first be approved by the Bureau of Firearms within the CAD.
Features.CALL_911_APPROVAL-description: When a citizen creates a 911 call and there are active dispatchers, this will require dispatch to approve the call before active units can view the call.
Features.DISCORD_AUTH-description: When enabled, this will allow users to authenticate with Discord.
Features.STEAM_OAUTH-description: When enabled, this will allow users to authenticate with Steam.
Features.FORCE_DISCORD_AUTH-description: When enabled, this will force users to sync with Discord after registration.
Features.FORCE_STEAM_AUTH-description: When enabled, this will force users to sync with Steam after registration.
Features.EDITABLE_SSN-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to edit their SSN.
Features.EDITABLE_VIN-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to edit their vehicle's VIN.
Features.SIGNAL_100_CITIZEN-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to view Signal 100's.
Features.FORCE_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD-description: When enabled, this will force users to set a password for their account when logging in via Discord or Steam.
Features.USER_DEFINED_CALLSIGN_COMBINED_UNIT: User Defined Callsign  for Combined Units
Features.USER_DEFINED_CALLSIGN_COMBINED_UNIT-desc: When enabled, this will allow users to define their own callsign for when creating a combined unit.
Features.HOSPITAL_SERVICES-description: When enabled, this will allow users with the correct permissions to manage dead citizens.
Features.MEDICAL_RECORDS_CITIZEN_MANAGEABLE-descr: When enabled, this will allow citizens to manage their own medical records. When disabled, this will only allow EMS/FD to manage citizen medical records.
Features.PETS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create pets.
Features.REQUIRED_CITIZEN_IMAGE-description: When enabled, this will require citizens to upload an image when creating a citizen.
Features.LEO_EDITABLE_CITIZEN_PROFILE-description: When enabled, this will allow LEO/EMS/FD/Dispatch to edit citizen profiles if the user has the 'Manage Citizen Profile (non-admin)' permission.
Features.ALLOW_MULTIPLE_UNITS_DEPARTMENTS_PER_USE: Allow multiple units with the same callsign and department per user
When enabled, officers and deputies can create multiple units with the same callsign and department.
Features.OPEN_LAW_BOOK-description: When enabled, this will allow every user to view the CAD's penal codes (Law Book)
Features.CITIZEN_RECORD_PAYMENTS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to mark their own records as paid.

Permissions.defaultPermissionsInfo: These permissions will be automatically granted to every user that creates a new account.
Permissions.defaultPermissionsWarning: It is recommended to only change this if you are sure every user that creates an account should be granted with the selected permissions.
Permissions.SetUserDefinedCallsignOnOfficer: Set User Defined Callsign On Officer
Permissions.SetUserDefinedCallsignOnEmsFd: Set User Defined Callsign On EMS/FD Deputy
